Description: Up for SALE is a USED 1995 Gibson Les Paul Studio Guitar w/hardshell case Serial No. 91995484 Made in the USA I see minor scuffs & scratches from normal use on this guitar. Action is very low. The pickguard is removed but inside the case.An Epiphone Hardshell Case is included with this auction. I'm selling this guitar for Grammy winning guitarist, Jim Seales. He's one of the founding members of the American Country group from Muscle Shoals, Alabama, "Shenandoah" (Lead guitarist and backing vocals) and he retired in 2014.His personal remarks regarding this guitar: "Killer action on this 1995 Les Paul Studio. Very deep wine red with black pick guard - all original. Love the neck on this guitar - a little chunky without being a baseball bat. Very comfortable. Back when Gibson quality was up to snuff. For pickups I'm going to guess this has 498T/490T combo - ultra smooth and full but not harsh at all ... warm when clean - I tried several different drives - very creamy and full. Extremely clean for a 24 year old guitar." Feel free to email me if you have any other questions or need more pictures. Used items are always sold "as described". Thanks for looking! Title: 1995 Gibson Les Paul Studio Guitar w/hardshell case
